title: BRAND detail page Â» COMPANY
user_story:
As a visitor\
I want the BRAND's parent COMPANY to be presented on the detail page\
So I can quickly see who their current owner is or if they are independent
description:
* The BRAND detail page is extended to contain a section for the connected COMPANY.
* The COMPANY is presented with its name and primary information.
* The COMPANY contains a link to its detail page.
* The COMPANY has a thumbnail image.
* When there is no COMPANY connected to the BRAND then the section is not displayed at all.
